Summary Grazia Caroselli is a writer/producer with several years of experience putting together non-fiction series (behind-the-scenes, documentary-style and reality formats) for all the major Networks and Cable clients. 
 
As a hybrid writer/producer she is adept at conceiving, developing and executing projects. She knows what it takes to grow an idea/story angle into a realized script with great characters, and how turn that idea into a workable shoot and edit.  
 
Comfortable with paper edits as well as paperless rough editing on Avid, Final Cut Pro, and can hand off or work with editors. Enjoys the entire post-production process, from working with editors in off-line as well as on-line. Has supervised VO sessions, audio sweetening, color correcting, as well as shaping cuts.  
 
As a team player, she enjoys keeping everyone happy by planning and making things run smoothly. She strives to anticipate clients' needs to keep all agendas on track.  
 
Strengths include strong research skills, creativity, organization and being a team player. Well-trained at molding strong story angles and making shoots successful, her shows end up solid and on budget, no matter what the subject. She continues to produce television programming that is at once exciting, educational and entertaining. 
 
She's been a member of the PGA, Producer's Guild for several years.
